name: Tiny Token Empires (itch)
description:
"Fun, fresh and silly in just the right way" - PocketGamer

"Will delight easygoing history buffs of all ages" - Blogcritics

"It's like someone took Puzzle Quest, Risk and Civilization, put them in a blender, and set it to awesome." - Gamezebo

Mixing brain-teasers, humour and strategy, Tiny Token Empires puts you in charge of five ancient Empires With its cute characters, tough enemies and compelling puzzles, you'll fall in love with this world - just before you conquer it!

You manouvre your troops, build forts, and get ready to fight.

The twist; you win battles by quickly matching puzzle tiles to heal your troops and unleash their special abilities - and your enemy is doing the same!

With 5 heroes, 25 generals, 50 unit types and 5 game modes, there's tons of complexity and replayability.

It's a huge game in a small world - and it's yours for the taking.

Game Features

  • A world of goofy gods and cute monsters
  • Five game modes
  • Five nations, five heroes, 25 generals and fifty troop types
  • Three difficulty levels to test the biggest brain
  • Five distinctive campaigns
  • Over 15 hours of gaming!
